00012         class MiniBatteryLoggerLicense extends License
00013         {
00017                 const SINGLE_USER_LICENSE = 0;
00018 
00022                 const FAMILYPACK_LICENSE = 1;
00023 
00027                 const SITE_LICENSE = 2;
00028                 
00032                 const EVALUATION_LICENSE = 3;
00033                 
00037                 const GIFT_LICENSE = 4;
00038                 
00042                 const DEFAULT_LICENSE_DURATION = 31536000;

00048                 public function MiniBatteryLoggerLicense($name = '', $email = '', $key = '')
00049                 {
00050                         $this->username = $name;
00051                         $this->email = $email;
00052                         $this->key = $key;
00053                         
00054                         $this->init();
00055                 }
00056 
00061                 protected function init()
00062                 {
00063                         if (self::valid_key($this->key,
00064                                 $this->username,
00065                                 $cleartext))
00066                         {
00067                                 $cleartext_parts = explode(';', $cleartext);
00068                                 $this->registration_date = strtotime($cleartext_parts[1]);
00069                                 $this->expiration_date = strtotime($cleartext_parts[2]);
00070                                 $this->license_type = $cleartext_parts[3];
00071                         }
00072                 }
00073                 
00078                 static public function parse_url($the_url)
00079                 {
00080                         $license = NULL;
00081                         $parts = explode('/', $the_url);
00082                         if (count($parts) == 6)
00083                         {
00084                                 $license = new self();
00085                                 $license->email = rawurldecode($parts[3]);
00086                                 $license->username = rawurldecode($parts[4]);
00087                                 $license->key = rawurldecode($parts[5]);
00088                         }
00089                         return $license;
00090                 }
00091 
00096                 public static function generate_key($username,
00097                         $registration_date = NULL,
00098                         $expiration_date = NULL,
00099                         $license_type = MiniBatteryLoggerLicense::SINGLE_USER_LICENSE)
00100                 {
00101                         $key = NULL;
00102                         
00103                         // Convert from ISO-8859-1 to UTF-8
00104                         $username = iconv("iso-8859-1", "utf-8", $username);
00105                         // Calculate SHA-1 hash
00106                         $hash = sha1($username);
00107                         // License start date
00108                         if (empty($registration_date))
00109                         {
00110                                 $registration_date = date("Y-m-d");
00111                         }
00112                         // License expiration date
00113                         if (empty($expiration_date))
00114                         {
00115                                 $expiration_date = date("Y-m-d", time() + MiniBatteryLoggerLicense::DEFAULT_LICENSE_DURATION);
00116                         }
00117                         // Digest to cypher
00118                         $digest = "{$hash};{$registration_date};{$expiration_date};{$license_type}";
00119 
00120                         $priv_key_path = dirname(__FILE__) . "/../openssl/mbl_private_key.pem";
00121                         
00122                         if (file_exists($priv_key_path))
00123                         {
00124                                 $fp = fopen($priv_key_path,"r");
00125                                 $priv_key = fread($fp, filesize($priv_key_path));
00126                                 fclose($fp);
00127                                 // $passphrase is required if your key is encoded (suggested)
00128                                 $passphrase = '';
00129                                 if (($res = openssl_get_privatekey($priv_key, $passphrase)) !== FALSE)
00130                                 {
00131                                         /*
00132                                          * NOTE:  Here you use the returned resource value
00133                                          */
00134                                         openssl_private_encrypt($digest, $crypttext, $res);
00135                                         // Calculate the key
00136                                         $key = Base64::encode_linelength($crypttext, 36);
00137                                 }
00138                         }
00139                         return $key;
00140                 }
00141                 
00146                 public static function valid_key($key,
00147                         $username = '',
00148                         &$cleartext = NULL)
00149                 {
00150                         $valid = FALSE;
00151                         
00152                         if (strlen($key) > 0 &&
00153                                 strlen($username) > 0)
00154                         {
00155                                 // Convert from ISO-8859-1 to UTF-8
00156                                 $username = iconv("iso-8859-1", "utf-8", $username);
00157                                 // Calculate SHA-1 hash
00158                                 $hash = sha1($username);
00159                                 // 
00160                                 $raw_key = Base64::decode($key);
00161         
00162                                 $pub_key_path = dirname(__FILE__) . "/../openssl/mbl_public_key.pem";
00163                                 
00164                                 if (file_exists($pub_key_path))
00165                                 {
00166                                         $fp = fopen($pub_key_path, "r");
00167                                         $pub_key = fread($fp, filesize($pub_key_path));
00168                                         fclose($fp);
00169                                         if (($res = openssl_get_publickey($pub_key)) !== FALSE)
00170                                         {
00171                                                 /*
00172                                                  * NOTE:  Here you use the returned resource value
00173                                                  */
00174                                                 openssl_public_decrypt($raw_key, $cleartext, $res);
00175                                                 
00176                                                 $cleartext_parts = explode(';', $cleartext);
00177                                                 $valid = $cleartext_parts[0] == $hash;
00178                                         }
00179                                 }
00180                         }
00181                         return $valid;
00182                 }

00188                 public function activation_link($text = NULL)
00189                 {
00190                         if (empty($text))
00191                         {
00192                                 $text = l('Click here to activate MiniBatteryLogger');
00193                         }
00194                         return a($text, array('href' => $this->activation_url()));

00201                 public function activation_url()
00202                 {
00203                         return sprintf('mbl://register/%s/%s/%s',
00204                                 rawurlencode($this->email),
00205                                 rawurlencode($this->username),
00206                                 rawurlencode($this->key));

00218                 public static function license_for($username,
00219                         $email,
00220                         $registration_date = NULL,
00221                         $expiration_date = NULL,
00222                         $license_type = MiniBatteryLoggerLicense::SINGLE_USER_LICENSE)
00223                 {
00224                         $key = self::generate_key($username,
00225                                 $registration_date,
00226                                 $expiration_date,
00227                                 $license_type);
00228                                 
00229                         $license = new self($username, $email, $key);
00230                         
00231                         return $license;
00232                 }

00239                 public static function license_type_name($license_type)
00240                 {
00241                         switch ($license_type)
00242                         {
00243                                 case self::SINGLE_USER_LICENSE:
00244                                         return 'Single user';
00245                                         break;
00246                                 case self::FAMILYPACK_LICENSE:
00247                                         return 'Family pack';
00248                                         break;
00249                                 case self::SITE_LICENSE:
00250                                         return 'Site license';
00251                                         break;
00252                                 case self::EVALUATION_LICENSE:
00253                                         return 'Evaluation license';
00254                                         break;
00255                                 case self::GIFT_LICENSE:
00256                                         return 'Gift license';
00257                                         break;
00258                         }
00259                 }
00260                 
00265                 public function __toString()
00266                 {
00267                         $registration_date = strftime('%d/%m/%Y', $this->registration_date);
00268                         $expiration_date = strftime('%d/%m/%Y', $this->expiration_date);
00269                         $license_type_name = self::license_type_name($this->license_type);
00270                         
00271                         return <<<EOT
00272 MiniBatteryLogger License
00273 
00274 Name:
00275 {$this->username}
00276 
00277 Key:
00278 {$this->key}
00279 
00280 Registered on:
00281 {$registration_date}
00282 
00283 Expires on:
00284 {$expiration_date}
00285 
00286 License type:
00287 {$license_type_name}
00288 EOT;
00289                 }
